message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is worth a significant amount to me, and I believe it could be of immense value to you as well. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product just yet, I'm confident it aligns with your interests. I'm prepared to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a price that reflects both the product's intrinsic value and my desire to see it in the right hands.  Please consider this offer carefully, as I believe it represents a remarkable investment opportunity.  If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who's willing to purchase it for $1500000.  I'm confident that you'll see the potential here.
